description.name: name of the aerial vehicle according to manufacturer
description.flight_range: maximum flight range of the aerial vehicle in [km]
description.cc_range: maximum command and control range of the aerial vehicle in [km]
description.flight_time: maximum flight time of the aerial vehicle in [minutes]

meta.name: name of the aerial vehicle according to manufacturer
meta.flight_range: flight range of the aerial vehicle left in [km]. Maximum flight range of the vehicle is 100km.
meta.flight_time: flight time of the aerial vehicle left in [minutes]. Maximum flight time of the vehicle is 90min.

events.object: object detected by computer vision system. Will be an item of [fire, smoke]
events.timestamp: timestamp of event in milliseconds since 1970 for UTC
events.lat: latitude of the coordinate of the event for WGS85, EPSG 4326 reference system
events.lon: longitude of the coordinate of the event for WGS85, EPSG 4326 reference system
events.confidence: confidence of the computer vision system inference. Value between 0 and 100.
events.sensor_used: sensor used for inference. Item of [Qube 240 LiDAR,Sony RX1 RII,MicaSense RedEdge-P,MicaSense Altum-PT]
